channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BOOKKEEPER-615] Twitter stats implementation of stats interface
item.description: Implementation of the generic stats interface using twitter stats.
item.summary: Twitter stats implementation of stats interface

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
https://github.com/ivankelly/bookkeeper/commit/730eeca2acceab7ad9fa187974f7ab4835c79d16

There's an implementation of the twitter stats provider on github. I'll upload a patch once the api has been finalized. To compile with the stats api, do 

mvn package -Ptwitter-stats

.

The code there is hardcoded to export on 8080. This should be configurable.
implement twitter stats provider of generic stats API.

Testing JIRA BOOKKEEPER-615

Patch 0002-twitter-stats-provider.patch downloaded at Tue Oct 29 05:02:00 UTC 2013

----------------------------

+1 PATCH_APPLIES
+1 CLEAN
-1 RAW_PATCH_ANALYSIS
. +1 the patch does not introduce any @author tags
. +1 the patch does not introduce any tabs
. +1 the patch does not introduce any trailing spaces
. +1 the patch does not introduce any line longer than 120
. -1 the patch does not add/modify any testcase
+1 RAT
. +1 the patch does not seem to introduce new RAT warnings
+1 JAVADOC
. +1 the patch does not seem to introduce new Javadoc warnings
+1 COMPILE
. +1 HEAD compiles
. +1 patch compiles
. +1 the patch does not seem to introduce new javac warnings
+1 FINDBUGS
. +1 the patch does not seem to introduce new Findbugs warnings
+1 TESTS
. Tests run: 882
+1 DISTRO
. +1 distro tarball builds with the patch

----------------------------
-1 Overall result, please check the reported -1(s)

The full output of the test-patch run is available at

. https://builds.apache.org/job/bookkeeper-trunk-precommit-build/515/

Committed r1536635. Thanks Sijie.
